name: password
description: This is a profile project for TypeScript and React. The page is hosted on GitHub Pages, using Ruby,, Jekylls, and GitHub Actions.

scripts.build: npm run-script clean:project && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --env=prod --progress --profile --colors && cross-env JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build && netlify-lambda build lambda

author: mbt1
